pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 17, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, November 17, 2016:

Buenos Aires, Argentina

7:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Ministro Pistarini International Airport in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Ministro Pistarini International Airport
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Canadian Council for the Americas.

Closed to media.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will lay a wreath at Plaza San Martin.

Plaza San Martin
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the Argentine Republic, Mauricio Macri.

Despacho Presidencial, 2nd Floor
Casa Rosada
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Sal√≥n Blanco, 2nd Floor
Casa Rosada
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a State dinner given by the President of the Argentine Republic, Mauricio Macri.

Courtyard
Quinta Presidencial de Olivos
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for opening remarks only


Note: All times are local


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
